short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Path of Exile challenges enhanced with a compact layout, search, tags, notes, and hide/show button for completed tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
◾ Compact Layout: our extension optimizes the website layout, presenting challenge information cleanly and organized.
◾ Efficient Search: quickly find specific challenges using the built-in search feature, avoiding endless scrolling.
◾ Custom Tags: categorize challenges with default tags like “blight” or “ultimatum” or with your custom tags.
◾ Tag Filters: focus on specific challenge types by using tag filters.
◾ Challenge Notes: add personal notes alongside challenge descriptions.
◾ Sidebar Notes: conveniently access challenge notes from the sidebar.
◾ Hide/Show Completed Challenges: declutter your view by hiding completed challenges.

Disclaimer: this extension is community-driven and not affiliated with Grinding Gear Games or Path of Exile.
